Method Detail

transform

public de.uka.ilkd.key.logic.Term transform(de.uka.ilkd.key.logic.Term term)
                                     throws TermTransformerException
Simplifies a postcondition by removing SortDependingFunction instances, ObserverFunction instances, as well as exception and heap models. These are not needed (for now) for the purpose of expressing correctness, and removing them makes the Term much more easy to work with.

Parameters:
term - the Term
Returns:
the simplified Term
Throws:
TermTransformerException - in the event of a parse error (including structural errors in the Term itself.

transformAnd

protected de.uka.ilkd.key.logic.Term transformAnd(de.uka.ilkd.key.logic.Term term)
                                           throws TermTransformerException
Simplifies an AND junctor by examining the operands. If one of them can be simplified to null, the entire junction can be replaced by the second operand. If both are simplified to null, the entire conjunction can be removed (hence this method will return null as well).

Overrides:
transformAnd in class AbstractTermTransformer
Parameters:
term - the term
Returns:
the transformed term
Throws:
ModelGeneratorException
TermTransformerException

transformEquals

protected de.uka.ilkd.key.logic.Term transformEquals(de.uka.ilkd.key.logic.Term term)
                                              throws TermTransformerException
Simplifies an EQUALS statement by examining the operands. If the first operand is simplified to null, the entire statement can be removed since it is now semanticallt useless.

Overrides:
transformEquals in class AbstractTermTransformer
Parameters:
term - the term the term
Returns:
the transformed term
Throws:
ModelGeneratorException
TermTransformerException

transformFormula

protected de.uka.ilkd.key.logic.Term transformFormula(de.uka.ilkd.key.logic.Term term)
                                               throws TermTransformerException
Remove formulas not needed to construct the oracle abstraction. These include the various logical functions introduced by Key.

Overrides:
transformFormula in class AbstractTermTransformer
Throws:
TermTransformerException

transformLocationVariable

protected de.uka.ilkd.key.logic.Term transformLocationVariable(de.uka.ilkd.key.logic.Term term)
Remove variables not needed to construct the oracle abstraction, in particular the ones representing exceptions.

Overrides:
transformLocationVariable in class AbstractTermTransformer
Parameters:
term - the term
Returns:
the transformed term

transformNot

protected de.uka.ilkd.key.logic.Term transformNot(de.uka.ilkd.key.logic.Term term)
                                           throws TermTransformerException
Simplify a negation. If the child is simplified to null, simply return null. Otherwise, create a new negation of the simplification of the child.

Overrides:
transformNot in class AbstractTermTransformer
Parameters:
term - the term (logical negator) to simplify
Returns:
the simplified negation
Throws:
TermTransformerException
ModelGeneratorException

transformOr

protected de.uka.ilkd.key.logic.Term transformOr(de.uka.ilkd.key.logic.Term term)
                                          throws TermTransformerException
Simplifies an OR junctor by examining the operands. If one of them can be simplified to null, the entire junction can be replaced by the second operand. If both are simplified to null, the entire conjunction can be removed (hence this method will return null as well).

Overrides:
transformOr in class AbstractTermTransformer
Parameters:
term -
Returns:
the transformed term
Throws:
ModelGeneratorException
TermTransformerException
